targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    checkouts.git_commit_hash AS git_commit_hash,
    checkouts.patchset_hash AS patchset_hash,
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT checkouts.origin, ', ' ORDER BY checkouts.origin ASC) AS origins,
    COALESCE(CAST(MIN(checkouts.start_time) AS TEXT), '') AS checkouts_start_time_str,
    MAX(CASE checkouts.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS checkouts_valid_num,
    MAX(CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS builds_valid_num,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM
    checkouts
LEFT OUTER JOIN
    builds
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
        COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE) AND
        builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
        builds.origin LIKE $origin
LEFT OUTER JOIN
    tests
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
        tests.origin LIKE $origin
WHERE
    checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
    checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
    checkouts.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    checkouts.origin LIKE $origin
GROUP BY
    checkouts.git_commit_hash,
    checkouts.patchset_hash

SELECT
    patchset_file ->> 'name' AS name,
    format_cached_url(patchset_file ->> 'url') AS url
FROM
    jsonb_array_elements((
        SELECT FIRST(patchset_files)
        FROM checkouts
        WHERE
            git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
            patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
            start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
            origin LIKE $origin
    )) AS patchset_file

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    checkouts.id,
    checkouts.origin AS origin,
    COALESCE(checkouts.git_repository_url, '') AS git_repository_url_str,
    COALESCE(checkouts.git_repository_branch, '') AS git_repository_branch_str,
    COALESCE(checkouts.git_commit_name, '') AS git_commit_name_str,
    COALESCE(CAST(checkouts.start_time AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    CASE checkouts.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS valid_num,
    MAX(CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS builds_valid_num,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM
    checkouts
LEFT OUTER JOIN builds ON builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id
LEFT OUTER JOIN tests ON tests.build_id = builds.id
WHERE
    checkouts.origin LIKE $origin AND
    checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
    checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
    checkouts.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
    COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
GROUP BY
    checkouts.id
ORDER BY
    valid_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    builds_valid_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    tests_status_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    checkouts.start_time DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    builds.id,
    builds.origin,
    COALESCE(builds.architecture, '') AS architecture,
    COALESCE(REGEXP_REPLACE(builds.compiler, '^(.{48}).+$', '\1‚Ä¶'), '') AS compiler,
    COALESCE(REGEXP_REPLACE(builds.config_name, '^(.{48}).+$', '\1‚Ä¶'), '') AS config_name,
    COALESCE(CAST(builds.start_time AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    COALESCE(TO_CHAR(builds.duration * INTERVAL '1 second', 'HH24:MI:SS.MS'), '') AS duration_str,
    COALESCE(builds.comment, '') AS comment,
    CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS valid_num,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM builds
INNER JOIN checkouts ON builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id
LEFT OUTER JOIN tests ON tests.build_id = builds.id
WHERE
    builds.origin LIKE $origin AND
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
    checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
    COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
    COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
GROUP BY
    builds.id
ORDER BY
    valid_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    tests_status_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    builds.start_time DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0) AS time,
    CASE WHEN builds.valid THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    builds
INNER JOIN
    checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE $origin
WHERE
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    builds.valid IS NOT NULL AND
    builds.origin LIKE $origin AND
    COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
    COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
GROUP BY builds.valid
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0) AS time,
    builds.architecture AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    builds
INNER JOIN
    checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE $origin
WHERE
    builds.origin LIKE $origin AND
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture AND
    COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE) AND
    NOT builds.valid
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0) AS time,
    builds.config_name AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    builds
INNER JOIN
    checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE $origin
WHERE
    builds.origin LIKE $origin AND
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
    builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name AND
    NOT builds.valid
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0) AS time,
    CASE WHEN LENGTH(builds.compiler) > 32 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(builds.compiler, 1, 31), '‚Ä¶') ELSE builds.compiler END AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    builds
INNER JOIN
    checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash' AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE $origin
WHERE
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    NOT builds.valid AND
    compiler IS NOT NULL AND
    builds.origin LIKE $origin AND
    COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
    COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN 'Root' ELSE '$test_path' END AS node_title,
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN '' ELSE '‚Æå Parent' END AS node_parent_title,
    CASE
        WHEN POSITION('.' IN '$test_path') = 0 THEN ''
        ELSE SUBSTRING('$test_path' FROM 1 FOR LENGTH('$test_path') - POSITION('.' IN REVERSE('$test_path')))
    END AS node_parent_path,
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN '' ELSE '‚Æå Root' END AS node_root_title,
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param

/* Massage */
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    origins,
    path,
    CASE
        WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN path
        ELSE substring(path FROM length('$test_path') + 2)
    END AS name,
    architectures,
    tests,
    COALESCE(CAST(min_start_time AS TEXT), '') AS min_start_time_str,
    COALESCE(
        FLOOR(EXTRACT(epoch FROM AGE(max_end_time, min_start_time))/3600) ||
        TO_CHAR(AGE(max_end_time, min_start_time), ':MI:SS.MS'),
        ''
    ) AS total_duration_str,
    status_num
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ', ') AS origins,
        LEFT(base_prefix, CHAR_LENGTH(base_prefix) - 1) AS path,
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT architecture, ', ') AS architectures,
        MIN(start_time) AS min_start_time,
        MAX(end_time) AS max_end_time,
        COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS tests,
        MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], status::text), 0) - COALESCE(waived::int, 2) * 7) AS status_num
    FROM (
        /* Filter tests and extract path prefixes */
        SELECT
            tests.origin,
            tests.id,
            /*
             * Prefix one level deeper than the displayed test's path,
             * i.e. the prefix children of this test should have
             */
            COALESCE(
                /*
                 * Handle the parent node of this test being displayed:
                 * cut the test path up to and including the first dot
                 * after the currently-displayed test's path, if possible.
                 */
                LEFT(
                    tests.path,
                    LENGTH('$test_path') +
                    NULLIF(POSITION('.' IN SUBSTRING(tests.path FROM LENGTH('$test_path') + 2)), 0) +
                    1
                ),
                /* Handle this test's node being displayed */
                tests.path || '.'
            ) AS base_prefix,
            builds.architecture,
            tests.start_time,
            tests.start_time + (tests.duration * INTERVAL '1 second') AS end_time,
            tests.status,
            tests.waived
        FROM tests
        INNER JOIN
            builds
            ON
                tests.build_id = builds.id AND
                COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
                COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
        INNER JOIN
            checkouts AS checkouts
            ON
                builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
                checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
                checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash'
        WHERE
            COALESCE(tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
            tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
            ('$test_path' = '' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
    ) AS filtered_tests
    GROUP BY
        base_prefix
) AS aggregated_tests
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    name ASC

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0) AS time,
    COALESCE(tests.status::text, 'UNKNOWN') AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM tests
INNER JOIN
    builds
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
        COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
INNER JOIN
    checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash'
WHERE
    COALESCE(tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR tests.path = '$test_path' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TO_TIMESTAMP(0 / 1000) AS time,
    tests.path AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM tests
INNER JOIN
    builds
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
        COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
INNER JOIN
    checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash'
WHERE
    COALESCE(tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.status = 'FAIL' AND
    tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR tests.path = '$test_path' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    tests.id,
    tests.origin,
    tests.path,
    tests.comment,
    builds.architecture,
    COALESCE(CAST(tests.start_time AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    COALESCE(
        TO_CHAR(tests.duration * INTERVAL '1 second', 'HH24:MI:SS.MS'),
        ''
    ) AS duration_str,
    COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7 AS status_num
FROM tests
INNER JOIN
    builds
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        COALESCE(builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture, TRUE) AND
        COALESCE(builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name, TRUE)
INNER JOIN
    checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = '$git_commit_hash' AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = '$patchset_hash'
WHERE
    COALESCE(tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000), TRUE) AND
    tests.origin LIKE $origin AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR tests.path = '$test_path' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    tests.path ASC
